subject: Document API requirements for frontend consumers
body:
- Add API.md with endpoint reference, request/response schemas,
  CORS rules, honeypot usage, and integration example
- Add OpenAPI 3.0 spec (api/openapi.yaml) for machine-readable docs
- Extract validation constants into shared api/api/constants.ts module
  so docs and handler reference a single source of truth

https://claude.ai/code/session_013UHKwwEjpYVkM9Bqbk8QHW
title: Document API requirements for frontend consumers
